website_summaries.verdict: A good quality scooter cover that comes with some nice extras.
pros: Offers protection from wind, rain, and sun
Metal grommet allows for use with a lock and the cover comes with a free combination lock
cons: Some buyers say this isn't completely waterproof

customer_reviews.title: Poorly constructed grommet(s)
customer_reviews.text: I just got the cover this week, used it a couple of times,and the second time when I was removing the lock that comes with it, the grommet fell out and the material ripped easily. Not a very durable product. I reordered and hope the new one lasts more than a week, but I have a feeling the replacement will probably fail as well. It was a great price, however, the saying you get what you pay for could be true here. Perhaps if I spent a little more, I would get a more durable cover with grommets that stay in place. Very poorly designed grommets :(
customer_reviews.author: Rashu

customer_reviews.title: As Advertised
customer_reviews.text: This is lightweight and just what we needed for our son. folds up small and nice in bag and gives protection from the elements during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Designed Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to cover two battery operated scooters for our month long beach trip as they were going to be outside. This cover is big enough to cover both scooters. It is well designed and has two orange handles to identify the front where the handle bars are. It also has a snap fastener at the bottom so it wont blow away. You might want to bring along a couple of bungee cords to keep the covers from flapping in the wind and to hold it tight. It seems like very strong material. Even though it was windy, it did not tear. It fit perfectly and did a good job of protecting the scooters.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The problem with motor cycle covers is that if you are an el-cheapo, you will most likely find a cover that blows off in the slightest gust of wind. This cover is solid. Well built eye holes, elastic strap in the middle, and thick enough to depend on it during rainy periods. If you are considering this cover, go for it !!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Kindred

customer_reviews.title: I went back to this brand because it's the perfect size and the buckle is a nice feature too
customer_reviews.text: I've actually bought 2 of these. I lost the first one. I went back to this brand because it's the perfect size and the buckle is a nice feature too. I sprayed it with a waterproofing spray and I saw the rain running right off of it today. Good cover for the price and customer service is nice too.
customer_reviews.author: Donald M Heins Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Covering for Honda Motorbike
customer_reviews.text: Fits my little Honda motorbike perfectly from top to bottom. Has a nice little strap that goes under the bike to keep the covering from being lifted from the bike in heavy winds. Light weight, but durable.
customer_reviews.author: Ibuotak

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great
customer_reviews.text: I got an Aprilia moped for Christmas and immediately started a search for a cover to protect it. After looking at several options online, I landed on this cover because of its tailoring and the grommet/lock system. I've only been using it for a week, so I can't tell you much about how long it will last out in the elements, but it fits great and is just what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Losefsky

customer_reviews.title: FLIMSY and DOES NOT HOLD UP outside in the weather!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I received this cover I was happy that it was lightweight. I started using it immediately to cover my scooter. After about two weeks outside int he elements, it was not very waterproof since the rain would seep thru onto the seat and basket which deceives the whole purpose. After week 3, there was a small tear that happened hear the back where it covered my metal basket...... it's NOT heavy duty as stated. Disappointed and not worth the cost. I would not purchase - look for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’m impressed with this cover. I leave my moped out during all weather and so far it’s held up to rain, wind and cold. In a particularly bad storm I came out to some water that had gotten under but it’s nothing like the wipe down I have to do when I forgot!
customer_reviews.author: Libbey DurkeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great fit!!
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for a Vespa scooter, with a windscreen nd rear luggage box, and it's perfect. The lock, although well received will work great to insure the covers safety, but will do very little to protect the scoot. I'll update down the road as to durability, right now it does all that it says. I strongly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great on my 2016 Honda Ruckus
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my 2016 Honda Ruckus with lowered handle bars and seat frame. I see no reason why it wouldn’t work on a fully stock ruckus either. Not that thickest material but I have had no issues with rips or tears. Has kept my ruckus dry through a few big storms now. Worth the money so far
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for the money
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The holes for the lock had metal type disks around it to reinforce the openings. The second time I removed the cover from my scooter the metal disks came off. Poorly made and flimsy materials. So far so good. I just wish the strap on the bottom was longer. I’ve had other brands with this as well and they are so short it makes them impossible or impractical to use. I love the ability to “lock” the cover to my scooter. It’s parked on the street and two prior covers were stolen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Glad I bought this. Very lightweight and easy to cover my scooter. It stays secure on my scooter when parked outside during windy/rainy days. It is water repellant and not waterproof completely. I cover my seat in a plastic bag as a precaution on rainy days. It also stows pretty compactly, not requiring a lot of space in my seat compartment. I would estimate it takes up a quarter of my under seat compartment, as I tend to be a little lazy when folding it up. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight, fits in a very small bag that is included. You get a nice little combo lock for free. Has neon red handles for high visibility in the dark. Good theft deterrent. Nice little cover.
customer_reviews.author: Emilio

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy- super thin!
customer_reviews.text: This ripped first time on my scooter. Updated: the company sent a replacement, no issues. Hopefully first cover was just a lemon. Overall great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Arlo

customer_reviews.title: Value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Its very durable and material is very good Comes with cable lock It completely covers the bike
customer_reviews.author: Vasanth Devabalan

customer_reviews.title: UPDATE  ! !  ! Weak UV Protection
customer_reviews.text: SESSIONS backs the product with a nice email and sent me a redesigned cover at no cost-THANKS SESSIONS
customer_reviews.author: Ron P

customer_reviews.title: New and Improved design
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these motorcycle covers 2 years ago & was satisfied with it. I needed another one so I reordered from my past orders list. To my surprise the new one was a thicker material and had elastic on the bottom edge so it covered the cycle more securely. Great quality product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ken Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not Good for Outdoors. Good Dust Cover
customer_reviews.text: I live in NJ so we see all types of weather. I bought this cover in February 2019 and am writing this review in September 2020. As you can see in this picture, the cover doesn’t last very long outdoors. The lock that it comes with is also pretty cheap and is really just a deterrent rather than an actual security feature. There are equivalent covers for cheaper so I would look around. This cover fit perfect on a Yamaha Zuma 125.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and material
customer_reviews.text: This cover is great. You can tell it’s made out of quality material that will hold up to the weather and time. The large fits my 50cc scooter perfectly. I’ve gone through a few motorcycle covers and even the medium size is too big for my 50cc. This fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits 49cc bike not 150cc bike
customer_reviews.text: Tarp arrived fast. Was as advertised. Very happy. Would recommend. Fits my 49cc bike but not my 150cc bike
customer_reviews.author: K. Carter

customer_reviews.title: Fits Honda Grom.
customer_reviews.text: So I’m definitely a real person, and I just received the cover. I have a Honda Grom and this thing fits like a glove. Sort of shiny, it’s elastic on the bottom and hugs nicely. Straps in the middle. And I didn’t know it came with the handle straps just for further stability. Idk, I like it. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor s.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cover
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what were looking for. Covers the scooter perfectly. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Connelly

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: We have a Geely scooter. Cover fits great. I like the elasticized edge around the bottom to help it snug around the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Reed

customer_reviews.title: Thechain works fine but the cover was crap.
customer_reviews.text: Had it for a week then the metal rings around the holes just popped out, and i was using the chain they gave me and i want being rough at all with it. So i tossed it and kept the chain. It works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Bettine Ervin-Wise

customer_reviews.title: Bang for Your Buck
customer_reviews.text: Great overall cover. Fits my 2018 Ruckus well. Definitely waterproof and I like the added strap to help against the wind. Packs up nice and neat too.
customer_reviews.author: The Dude

customer_reviews.title: Great Scooter cover. Fits a Vespa )modern well.
customer_reviews.text: The cover seems well made, fits nicely, has a storage pouch and even came with a lockable security cable. I am quite pleased with it, no complaints what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: R. Anthony Daily

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use, and keeps the bike nice and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Eagan Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, water resistant and fits my new scooter perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Lee Naylor

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Scooter
customer_reviews.text: Fits my Yamaha Zuma perfectly, not too tight and not too loose. Very lightweight and compacts easily into its tiny storage bag included. I use it anytime it’s about to rain and it seems to work very well. Great price and value as well.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S.

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover for my little 49cc scooter just to keep it dry and clean. It only lasted a few weeks before it got ripped blowing around in the wind. It's possible that it would have lasted longer if the fit was better (it was pretty oversized for my scooter). Once a small rip forms, it's impossible to keep the fabric in one piece. I will definitely be replacing this item with something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Fits Well and Looks Good
customer_reviews.text: Fits Well and Looks Good--only time will tell if it wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Buster

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly, easy to handle, fits in my trunk easily, and the seller is very engaging with their customers and has excellent customer service. this thing is sleek looking and keeps my bike relatively cool in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Christopher watt

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is greatness. Feels tough and durable. Fits my 150cc moped/scooter perfectly bought it to replace a cheap one I bought
customer_reviews.author: ricky acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Economical choice
customer_reviews.text: For what it cost, does as expected. Got it for a scooter and it covers it perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Cover works great for my son’s scooter! Light weight, durable and fits perfectly. No more brushing the snow off and dealing with a wet seat and instruments after snow or rain.
customer_reviews.author: cew

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 1960 Vespa!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent cover for my 1960 Vespa. It fit perfectly and stays secure with the elastic around the entire bottom. Just bought a second one for my husbands Vespa. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Mathieson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a perfect fit for my grom and it’s very durable and especially the lock it comes with helps so much!!
customer_reviews.author: Megan xiong

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I like this cover a lot and it fits my Tao Tao scooter. Except 9 months later, it broke down from the sun and began to tear all over.
customer_reviews.author: Deby

customer_reviews.title: Shreds in the wind.
customer_reviews.text: The one feature you don't want: it self destructs on windy day. Super thin material.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Benedict

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: More water resistant than waterproof but works well for the price. the lock is garbage but its a bonus so meh.
customer_reviews.author: Zackary Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and best part it comes with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Light wait cover, easy to install and best part it comes with a combination lock. Cover is washable and easy to maintain. Cover fits snug over the moped and the lock keeps it from any unwanted visitors. Thank you for the fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Juan H Berrios Jr

customer_reviews.title: Scooter  Ready.....Large enough. Lock and storage bag was a bonus..
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for a scooter. I Just recieverd it in the mail, but it looks to be very sturdy and I like the fact, that the lock was included. Price was a deal....
customer_reviews.author: Serrena I.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover for the value
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a great cover for its value
customer_reviews.author: Budget BushKraft

customer_reviews.title: Very lightweight, easy to pack and stow away
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Awesomeness! Your cover is working perfectly on our new Razor Ecosmart Metro Electric Scooter. We are super happy with it! Love the handles, Logo , Locks and so easy to pack and stow away. Great design, too.
customer_reviews.author: Light

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product quality at the low price.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product and exactly what I need for the price. I haven't seen it in a deluge yet but for normal rain it has worked great! The seams look like they are taped which helps keep the water out. Combined with the lock and the carrying bag, I can easily stow it under my seat and break it out at a moments notice when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got a moped and need a cover for protection as I didn’t want the heat or rain consently beating down on it. Seen few cover at shops around town and they was well over 45 dollars. Seen this cover and decided to give them a shoot since it was reasonably priced and include lock. Happy I choose them! Cover fits perfectly over moped. There is loops in cover so you can put lock through so no one steals your cover. Great quality and material.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 👍🏻 fits perfect and the water runs right off when she takes it off. Lock is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Cover - too small 2017 Genuine Buddy 50cc
customer_reviews.text: The cover is a great quality and arrived quickly. Only downfall is that it doesn’t fit my Genuine Buddy 50cc well, its a little short and I had to pull off my storage bin in the back. The lock & clip underneath are a great combination to keep the cover on through storms. Keeping it and using until I get a larger cover.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby Rose

customer_reviews.title: I received my cover and love them. I feel a lot safer now that ...
customer_reviews.text: Hey Eddie lots of thanks to you. I received my cover and love them. I feel a lot safer now that I can leave my bike without worrying about rain or any other damages or theft.
customer_reviews.author: Kaeo Freitas

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cover, fits my Genuine Buddy 50 and have some extra room. Making an update, the cover resist today's pouring rain and it didn't move with the wind at all.
customer_reviews.author: LianF

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you scooters not tall
customer_reviews.text: My Scotter is bigger for the cover so it's will not fit
customer_reviews.author: Paul Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good product and would highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended, owner was very personal and sent me a koozie and a handwritten note. Very good product and would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: drew

customer_reviews.title: Moped Cover
customer_reviews.text: Moped cover arrived on time and in good condition. The corded lock is easy to use and fits comfortably in the bag, that was provided to tote the moped cover and lock in.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be poorly made.
customer_reviews.text: One of the eyelets came right off of the cover with ease the first time I used it...
customer_reviews.author: Jangel720

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I have only few days with this product but seems like is perfect to its function.
customer_reviews.author: Andres Toro

customer_reviews.title: Economic
customer_reviews.text: Exact and proportion to my motorcycle with free wire lock
customer_reviews.author: RYAN-JULIUS C.  ELEGADO

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased April 28, 2019, it is now March 7, 2020. Covers have faded and become brittle thin. Clearly not a long-term outdoor storage option. Maybe a good dust cover indoors or short trips.
customer_reviews.author: deborah Allred

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I put the cover over my moped and the area around the lock-hole in Front ripped. The cover is very thin and should be the first warning that it is not durable.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: No Beer cozy! Lol
customer_reviews.text: Never received my beer cozy. But that aside. It fits fine so far. Will update in a week after the rain hits.
customer_reviews.author: kel

customer_reviews.title: whats a headline ?
customer_reviews.text: good material, strong, detailed well. it does not fit across the mirrors of my2018 honda pcx. to bad for me
customer_reviews.author: john jessup

customer_reviews.title: Protects and Locks
customer_reviews.text: It fits my scooter, it locks, and protects it from the elements. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Brion

customer_reviews.title: Great product and value
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Handles and strap underneath are awesome also love the bag for it that fits under the seat. Customer service is top notch!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M.

customer_reviews.title: Windy days
customer_reviews.text: It’s does what it supposed to do Would buy again Just don’t use on windy days I used it and my moped got blown over on the ground by the wind and my moped was new. Now I have scratches on it ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This item does not even cover my whole scooter and it's a 150cc prestige. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Elle bra

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and a very interested seller..I appreciate the attention... DM
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Mac

customer_reviews.title: Great bike cover for your 29er
customer_reviews.text: Works well for my 29er giant xtc and my road bike. Prime shipping is a plus. Seems to be same quality as all the others available on amazon. The grommets are great quality... so you can really secure it around the entire bike. Comes with a carry bag, the cover itself, and a 4-digit combination bike lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The moped cover worked great and would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Pequeno

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Material was poorly made it was destroyed within 2 months
customer_reviews.author: Marceline

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Cover seems to be a good product, only used once so far. I didn’t get the koozie though!
customer_reviews.author: Brand

customer_reviews.title: NON-WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: It does everything but its not waterproof. It claims to be but its not but everything else its okay. It fits my 2013 Honda Metropolitan 49cc scooter perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Wong

customer_reviews.title: True to size
customer_reviews.text: This cover fits great on my Ruckus. Great deal. It even comes with a bike lock.
customer_reviews.author: Ed D

customer_reviews.title: Great Price and Quality Productv
customer_reviews.text: fits perfectly on our scooters and it had the additional bonus of a lock and carry bag!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Chen

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this. Tears easily.
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a couple of weeks now and it's already has a tear. Not durable and would pass
customer_reviews.author: P Salvador

customer_reviews.title: FITS PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cover----it fits perfectly on a moped and the combination lock is a super bonus! We had no problem with it "blowing away"this time like we did the last cover we bought
customer_reviews.author: KIKI

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof!! I should have gotten a tarp ...
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof!! I should have gotten a tarp instead of this thing. So I had to go get a 2.00 tarp and 2 small bungee cords for a 1.00. now it rain proof. No thanks to this cover. And to thin to protect from the sun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Love this. Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Easy to put on, fits well with my back basket and over the windshield. Stays in place and covers all. I do have to keep my round helmet in the back basket so the rain does not collect there but that is where I keep it anyway. Good price and great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the new moped. Product is as described
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamongirl

customer_reviews.title: 100% satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as a gift for my son. He was very happy with it. Good quality and fit. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: diane eason

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover that comes with a lock
customer_reviews.text: Can’t go wrong. Fits perfect for Honda Grom and the combination lock does its job. You can’t custom the combination but I have no issue with that. The cover is in perfect condition and the adjustable strap does it’s job. Already went through a storm and lots of wind and it held up high. Let’s pray it’s stays that way. All in all great cover for it’s price.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

product_meta.title: Motorcycle Cover For Moped Scooter - Waterproof Outdoor Bike Storage With Bonus Lock Heavy Duty Tarp Material Bicycle Covers UV Rain Dust Protection Dirt Bike 50cc Accessories
product_meta.description:
Session Industries Cover for Motorcycles, Scooters, Mopeds


✔Looking to keep your sweet moped looking nice and new?

We have the perfect product for you. We’ve put time and care into developing this cover and absolutely love it on our own rides!

✔Protection for all conditions…

This bike cover works great for storage indoors and out. It is made of HIGH QUALITY yet light weight material so it’s easy to use yet wear and tear resistant!

☂Water Proof and UV Resistant☀

Don’t worry about your sick new bike getting wet from rain and snow or faded from the sun because our cover is designed to block all the bad stuff!

✔Your Moped Deserves Safety!

Your ride treats you good and gets you from point A to point B on the reg, so do it a favor and protect it with our loop design. The metal grommet will allow you to place a lock through it.

✔FREE Combination Lock

There’s not much you can get for FREE these days but we’ve decided to hook you up with one of our combination locks as a way to say THANKS!

✔Large Design For A Wide Range Of Motorbikes

These are designed for 49 cc or 50 cc mopeds such as the Honda Spree, Ruckus, Metropolitan, Yamaha Zuma, Vino, TMAX, BMW C 650 GT, Vespa 946, Aprilia SRV, Pocket Bikes, and pit bikes!

✔A Versatile Product

Our customers also use these for Large bicycles such as 29ers, Beach Cruisers and Road Bikes. People also love them as Mobility Scooter Covers. If you have a question about it fitting it for your specific use, don’t hesitate to ASK!


✔TOP RATED

Our customers love this Moped Cover. Check out the reviews below and see why it’s one of the best selling moped tarps on Amazon!
feature_bullets: 🛵 STORE YOUR MOTORCYCLE, MOPED OR SCOOTER SAFELY - Our cover is made of HIGH QUALITY THICK material. It's durable, tear resistant and will keep your bike covered from all weather elements keeping your ride looking new!

🛵 READY FOR RAIN OR SHINE - Our weather proof design is ready for any condition you throw at it. It's water proof and UV resistant which makes it perfect for any climate including rain, snow, dust, bugs, dirt and wind. Be ready for winter! Think a practical gift idea!

❗NEW HEAVY-DUTY SMART DESIGN❗- Our cover went through a re-design, it's STRONG and BIG! At approximately 80" L x 27.5" W x 43" H, it’s great for Mopeds, Scooters, Electric Bikes, Mountain Bikes, 29ers, Bicycles, Beach Cruisers, Road Bikes, Electric Bikes, Small Motorcycles, Mini Bikes, 50cc, 80cc Dirtbikes and more! We GUARANTEE it will NOT rip! Shop with confidence, because you’re covered by our 100% money back promise.
🛵 WHEN SAFETY MATTERS - We know losing a bike or motorcycle to theft is a terrible feeling. That's why we've integrated a safety loophole with a theft resistant thick metal grommet.

🛵 FREE LOCK AND AWESOME DRINK KOOZIE - As an added bonus, we've included one of our anti-theft combination bike locks to help keep your ride safe! Put it through our heavy duty re-enforced grommet lock holes to secure your ride! This works great on bike racks, for those living on college campus, in a town house or apartment. Also remember to contact us after your sale for a FREE Koozie!
